'''The Greater Lord's Remaining Consciousness''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during the {{Quest|Where the Boat of Consciousness Lies}}.

==Walkthrough==
# Defeat the monsters affected by forbidden knowledge pollution.
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Pyro Slime*2;Hilichurl Fighter*2;Pyro Hilichurl Shooter}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Rock Shieldwall Mitachurl;Large Pyro Slime;Anemo Samachurl;Electro Hilichurl Shooter}}
# Use the [[Four-Leaf Sigil]] to reach the next island.
# Defeat the affected monsters. {{Enemy List|Rockfond Rifthound;Rockfond Rifthound Whelp*2}}
# Use the Four-Leaf Sigils to reach the next island with enemies.
# Defeat the affected monsters. {{Enemy List|Hilichurl Grenadier*2;Electro Samachurl}}
# Use the Four-Leaf Sigil to reach the Boat of Consciousness.
# Defeat the affected monsters.
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Electro Slime*2;Pyro Hilichurl Shooter*2;Dendro Samachurl;Blazing Axe Mitachurl}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Hilichurl Grenadier*2;Thunderhelm Lawachurl}}
# Interact with the helm of the boat on the upper deck.
